00062     class Action {
00063     protected:
00065       ValueStack *stack;
00067       pAtom atom;
00069       std::string my_name;
00070 
00071       // Some utility functions...
00072 
00074       int binComp(void);
00075 
00076       bool negativeOperand(void);
00077 
00078       void binaryFalseResult(void);
00079 
00081       void hasAtom(void);
00082 
00083     public:
00084       Action(const std::string s) : stack(0), atom(pAtom()), my_name(s) { }
00085 
00086       void setStack(ValueStack*);
00087       void setAtom(pAtom&);
00088 
00089       virtual std::string name(void) const;
00090 
00091       virtual void execute(void) =0;
00092       virtual ~Action() { }
00093 
00094     };
00095 
00096 
00097 
00099     class pushString : public Action {
00100       Value val;
00101     public:
00102       explicit pushString(const std::string str) : Action("pushString"), val(str) { }
00103       void execute(void);
00104       std::string name(void) const;
00105     };

00182     class matchRegex : public Action {
00183       boost::regex regexp;
00184     public:
00185       explicit matchRegex(const std::string s) : Action("matchRegex"), regexp(s, boost::regex::perl|boost::regex::icase), pattern(s) { }
00186       void execute(void);
00187       std::string name(void) const;
00188     
00189     private:
00190       std::string pattern;
00191     };
